name: Table Fan
description: Family of 5 requires a table fan as their current one has broken down. They are dependent on financial assistance. Mother is unable to work as one of her children has special needs.

name: Electric Airpot
description: A single elderly in her 50s is currently in need of a hot water dispenser for her daily needs. She requires hot water for her medication and making food (such as oatmeal). She is currently making do by boiling her water on her stove, which is taking up electric gas. (An electric airpot/hot water dispenser will be helpful for her so she can press the button, and hot water can be dispensed.) Kindly contact 8551 7453 for further clarifications.

name: Washing machine
description:
Client is requesting for a washing machine due to her current mobility issues. She used to be able to cope with her daily household chores and washes her clothes by hand. After a long stay in the hospital, her physical condition has deteriorated affecting her ability to cope with her daily activities of livings. 
Please consider to cover the installation costs of the washing machine and water pipe as well. Thank you.

name: Electric oven
description: We are requesting for a client who would need an oven as she is learning to bake on her free time, and hopes to eventually set up her own homebased business in the long term. She suffers from a genetic heart condition and is currently waiting to get a job as she was recently deemed fit for work. SSO has been supporting her financially in the meantime.

name: CCTV
description: Family consisting a single mother and her step-daughter living in a rental unit. Mother is currently unemployed due to a chronic health condition. Family experienced recent harassment and having a CCTV would help in monitoring the movements outside their home and increase their sense of safety.

name: Television
description: Family of 2 (client and grandmother) just moved into their new rental flat. Their current television has lines on the screen and will be good if they can receive a new one in case the current one breaks down.

contact.org: AMKFSC Community Services Ltd - Cheng San
contact.name: Louise Quek

name: TV
description: Parents caring for two children of ages 5 and 19. Father was recently terminated from work and mother has not been working due to health issues. Family has been struggling to make ends meet. Their current TV has spoilt. Family hopes to get a functional TV as it serves as a form of entertainment for them, especially their youngest child.(Omai)

contact.org: THK Family Service Centre @ Bedok North
contact.name: Teddy Fu

name: Washing Machine
description: Single mother caring for two school-going children. Mother is unfit for work due to health issues. Their current washing machine has spoilt and they have to resort to handwash all their clothes. Family hopes to get a functional washing machine.(Omai)

contact.org: THK Family Service Centre @ Bedok North
contact.name: Teddy Fu

name: Top Load Washing Machine
description: Two homeless elderly uncles are moving into their new rental flat soon and they are not able to afford furniture and electrical appliances for their rental flat as they are not working. They are currently staying in our homeless shelter. They will need a top load washing machine to wash their clothing at home.

name: Vacuum Cleaner
description:
Client is the caregiver of 3 young children. 
The family is on financial assistance as her husband is serving his sentence. The family resides in a rental flat, whereby finances are only sufficient for day-to-day necessities. Her vacuum cleaner has malfunctioned and she would not be able to make a purchase of this item. As such, she is willing to receive any pre-loved donation.

name: Fridge
description: A family with 6 children and an elderly requiring a refrigerator to store food and groceries for the household. The current fridge has been leaking. Father is unemployed and mother is earning low wage income.

name: Portable AirCon
description: Family has 2 children with skin disorders (eczema and allergies), their doctor advised getting an aircon to improve their skin condition and reduce discomfort. Please consider covering the cost of delivery as the family cannot afford it. You may contact me at 69784094. (Please note that it is different to an air cooler).

contact.org: Care Corner Family Service Centre - Queenstown
contact.name: Rachel Ong

name: Washing machine
description:
Single mother with 3 children requires a washing machine with a 13amp plug (normal 3-pin, not the rounded plug). Their old one has spoilt and they cannot afford to go laundromat daily to wash their clothes. 

They were previously given another washing machine but it comes with the 15amp pin (round ones) and they do not have the 15amp socket installed in the house, and cannot afford to install a new socket. As such, will need another washing machine suitable for the house.

name: Fridge
description: Family comprises of husband, wife and 5 school-going children. Family has been using fridge for 15 years and it has spoilt. However, as husband has health conditions and mobility issues, he is unemployed. Family faces financial constraints as wife is sole breadwinner.

name: Water Heater
description: Homeless low-income individual is moving into his new unfurnished rental flat with another unemployed individual who is medically certified unfit for work.

description: Homeless low-income individual is moving into his new unfurnished rental flat with another unemployed individual who is medically certified unfit for work.

name: Refrigerator
description: An elderly, who requires a working refrigerator, as she moves into a rental flat with an elderly co-occupier. Both of them are unemployed.

name: Fridge
description:
The nuclear family of four is facing a difficult time as the sole breadwinner who also suffers from chronic health issues has been certified as medically unfit for work. 
Mother, on the other hand, is presently taking up a course to increase her employability chances. She toggles between the caregiving of her two children and the frequent visits with her husband to the hospital. Having to reside in a rental flat, the family of four is unable to pay large purchases and will be grateful to receive any pre-loved item to store their items.
specifications: Kindly give us 2-3 weeks time frame

description:
Client is a single mother and will be shifting to her new rental flat in Yishun.

name: Television
description: My client is single, aged 60 and is currently residing in a 1 room rental unit. Due to mental health condition, he is unable to stabilise his employment, and thus, he is currently doing ad-hoc job as a cleaner. Client requests for a working tv as his current tv is not functioning.

name: Portable air-conditioner
description:
Client, aged 40 is currently a single parent to her 2 children, aged 7 and 6 years old. They are placed under MSF Foster Care since December 2016.
Client currently has weekends access with her children. As her house is not air-conditioned, her children's eczema tends to worsen during their stay with client. To manage their skin condition, client has requested for us to source a portable air-con for her.

Please contact social worker Odelia at odeliawong@carecorner.org.sg should you wish to donate.

contact.name: Juanna Sia

name: Freezer
description:
Freezer
Client is from a low-income family. recently husband's, who is sole breadwinner, his employment situation has not been very stable. She is looking for a freezer to store her fresh foods in however is unable to afford a new one. It would be helpful if they are able to receive one! Thank you :)

name: TV

name: Portable air cooler

name: Television
description: Client is a single mother. Her husband passed away in 2015 due to health issues. She is unemployed as she has multiple health issues and her two big toes are amputated due to diabetes. Her eldest son is waiting to be enlisted in NS and her youngest is still studying. Client has significant financial hardship as she is unable to meet the basic household needs. Client requested for a television as her TV has broken down. As client has lack of funds, she hopes to have a donor who can sponsor the delivery.

name: Adult Bicycle
description: Family of 4 children and 1 newborn. Father's bicycle was damaged and beyond use. Bicycle is needed for father's work. Height of client is between 1.7-1.8m.

name: bicycle
description: Client (F/26) is the sole breadwinner of the household (consisting of her and her parents). She has multiple mental health conditions and has unstable employment. Family is struggling financially, and she requires a bicycle for her to do Grab Food delivery to extra income to support the family's daily expenses. (Melissa)

name: electric wheelchair
description:
client is requesting for an electric wheelchair due to mobility issues.
 

He recently developed a condition where all his bones are fusing together starting with his legs, and requires a wheelchair to get around. As he is losing mobility in his hands as well, an electric wheelchair would be more appropriate.

name: Commode
description:
Client is an elderly mother with 2 surviving children. She is reliant on her limited savings for her living expenses due to her paying off her deceased son(Declared bankrupt) arrears.

She is 78 years old and is diagnosed with a hunched spine. Requires a waking aid-umbrella while ambulating at home and a trolley while ambulating in the community. 

Oldest child is employed as a taxi driver and is paying maintenance towards his divorced wife for the care of children.

Youngest child is a homemaker and facing financial challenges in her husband's home business.  She is currently unemployed with no means of income.

Donation of commode would be greatly appreciated, many thanks.

contact.org: THK Family Service Centre @ Bedok North
contact.name: Teddy Fu

name: Motorized Wheelchair Needed for Elderly Client!
description: Client is an elderly woman with limited mobility. She is presently residing alone and is dependent on others when she utilizes her manual wheelchair. The motorized wheelchair will help her to regain her personal independence and enable her to fulfil her day-to-day needs and errands with more ease.

name: Wheelchair with elevating leg rest
description: Client is a 32 year old lady, with 4 school-going children. Her elderly father has recently undergone a leg amputation, and requires a wheelchair, particularly one that can elevate your feet, to move around and recuperate from the surgery. As client has to care for 4 children, her financial resources are very limited and she is not able to afford to get a good wheelchair for her father.

contact.org: AMKFSC Community Services Ltd - Cheng San
contact.name: Jio Hui Zhen

name: Mobility Scooter
description:
Client, 49F, works as a Grabfood deliverer. She is a divorcee and has two children living with her, aged 20M and 16F. She has been using a second-hand mobility scooter with faulty brakes, which has posed as a physical safety concern for her. She suffers from eroded knee joint cartilage on both knees which had been impacted from having to use her legs to control the speed when slowing down. She is also diagnosed with asthma/chronic obstructive pulmonary disease and is on regular inhalers. She gets short of breath when she walks long distances and hence, is heavily reliant on her mobility scooter. 

Client is looking for a replacement mobility scooter that has working brakes. She is open to having a second-hand one as well.

contact.org: Care Corner Family Service Centre - Toa Payoh
contact.name: Merissa Boh

name: Motorize wheelchair
description: Client is an elderly man with diabetes. Due to water retention he is not able to walk very well. His elderly wife is unable to push him on a wheelchair, and he has a frozen shoulder, making it difficult to wheel himself. As such, he would like to request for a motorized wheelchair so he can move around more easily

name: Milk Powder & Diapers
description: Family of 4 is living in a 3-room flat. Client is the main caregiver to her 3-years-old daughter who suffers from eczema, as well as an elderly mother with chronic illness, who has just underwent toe amputation due to poorly-controlled diabetes. Client has not been able to work due to her caregiving duties and is in a tight financial situation. She is needing urgent assistance for these items: Isomil Plus (for 1 to 10 years old and MamyPoko Pull-Ups Pants Size: XXXL (extra dry skin for daughter's eczema issues). Requesting for delivery to our office at Wisma Geylang Serai #03-01. For further liaison and enquiries, kindly contact me at 98598768 from Mon-Fri 9-5pm, thank you.

name: Diapers and Milk Powder
description: Family 1 needs Drypers diapers in size L and milk powder Frisolac Stage 2 (6-12months) at 4 packs/tins each; Family 2 needs Drypers diapers in size XL and milk powder Similac Total Comfort 3 at 4 packs/tins each. Please contact us for delivery address. Note: Delivery costs will be covered by donors. We appreciate your kind donation and generosity. Every makes a difference!

name: 40 X 227g Anchor pure New Zealand unsalted block butter
description: We are requesting for 40 slabs of 227g of Anchor Pure New Zealand unsalted block butter for our house baking. This is part of the work therapy provided at The Helping Hand. The Helping Hand is a Voluntary Welfare Organization affiliated with the National Council of Social Service. We run a home providing drug rehabilitation and after-care services to male drug addicts and ex-offenders in Singapore. This is a residential programme carried out in our agency home, which was graciously provided by the Singapore government in recognition of our services to the community. We have a total of about 100 residents and staff staying in at our premise.

name: Working Smart Phone
description: Client is about the be released from prison. She requires a functional handphone so that she can liaise with her new employer, as well as her children's childcare/schools. Your help will support client as she tries her best to turn over a new leaf for the sake of her children!

Anyone who is keen to donate to this family can reach me directly for more details. Thank you!

name: Size XL Diapers (Tape)
description: Client is a cancer patient on palliative care. She has been bed-ridden for the past few months and requires full-time caregiving. Her husband is the primary caregiver, and he had given up his full-time job to care for the client. The couple depends on social assistance and are frugal in their spending. The client requires diapers and this incur additional expenses for the family. The couple has a son who is in Primary 5.

name: Adult Diaperss Size XL
description:
Mdm S is an elderly client known to Thye Hua Kwan Moral Charities (THKMC), who has has multiple chronic illnesses, including a history of stroke that makes her difficult to walk. Mdm S requires adult diapers (pull-up, XL) to improve her quality of life.  

 

THKMC is looking for 4 packs of adult pull-up diapers, size XL. 

 

If you know of someone who has the items for donation, please contact Raihana at 8292 2215. The recipient is located at Henderson.

 

Since October 2011, THKMC was incorporated as a charity with an IPC status to provide multiple social and welfare services to the community at large. THKMC provides assistance to the Elderly, Families, Children & Youth, and Persons with Disabilities, through more than 70 programmes and services. 

 

THK Elderly Services Division provides many programmes and services to serve the elderly in need – one of which includes THK Cluster Support. THK Cluster Support provides social support through case management, monitoring, and basic counselling services to vulnerable seniors, and facilitates coordination in the provision of community-based care and support services to the seniors. This service aims to improve the quality of life of vulnerable seniors, particularly for low or no income seniors who are socially-isolated and have minimal or no family support.

name: Pressure Relief Mattress
description:
Patient is a 39 years old female who is bed-bound and uncommunicative since 2018. She is married with a four-year old son. Patient’s husband is unemployed as he is the full-time caregiver for her. Patient requires a pressure relief mattress to prevent pressure sores. Patient’s current pressure relief mattress is stained with urine and it would be challenging to clean it as patient is always lying on it. The family has difficulty affording a new pressure relief mattress due to husband’s unemployment.

The item can be found here: https://www.medicalsupplies.com.sg/pressure-relief/1873-air-mattress-yh-med-45-cell-pad-mattress-w-pump-per-unit (Pharmex). This is the model similar to patient’s current pressure relief mattress model.

Kindly arrange the donated item to be delivered to patient’s house directly. You can Whatsapp Jia Ling at 82479135 for details. Thank you!

name: Commode
description:
Elderly lady living in a rental flat. 
She'll require a commode due to her fraility and high fall risks in the toilet.

name: TENA Super XL Pants
description:
Patient is a 42 years old male who is single and living with his elderly mother in a two-room HDB rental flat. His mother is his main caregiver. He requires assistance with his daily activities and is totally dependent. The family does not have any income and is reliant on various assistances for daily subsistence. Thus, the family has difficulty affording the ongoing consumables for patient.

Patient uses TENA Super XL Pants. The item can be found here: https://www.watsons.com.sg/pants-super-adult-diapers-xl-12s/p/BP_57783 (Watsons) or https://www.guardian.com.sg/tena-pants-super-xl-12pcs/p/171935 (Guardian).

Kindly arrange the donated items to be delivered to patient’s house directly. You can WhatsApp Jia Ling at 82479135 for details. Thank you!

Mother is a responsible lady who tries her best to support her family despite her own health condition. The donation of diapers would be very helpful in helping family tide through their challenges.

name: Diapers (Lifree)
description: Recently divorced elderly, 70 years old, requires assistance with getting diapers as she is unable to afford them on her own. Due to her recent change in marital status, she is no longer supported by her children or ex-husband, leaving her with rental and bill arrears. Hoping to find a donor who would be able to sponsor some adult diapers so she may alleviate costs for her medical needs. She prefers Lifree brand as it does not cause discomfort to her.

name: L size - Tena Pull up diapers
description:
Client is an elderly man in his 90s, living with dementia. 
He was recently discharged from hospital, and family requires around 1 carton of pull-up diapers while he's recuperating.

name: Desktop CPU / Laptop

Client is keen to support her husband, and intends to start a home-based business. However, she requires a CPU or laptop to continue with her plans. (Kamie)

The family is staying in a HDB rental unit and they are heavily relying on the financial assistance from the Social Service Office, hence, they are unable to provide much entertainment options to their son in view of the lack of extra financial resources. They are hoping to get a donation of a PS4 and also an electric piano so that their 11-year-old son can have some fun while at home.
